We love planning events: organising and coordinating all aspects of your event, from inception to execution. From finding and  booking venues, to sourcing all the items needed for hiring, agreeing the theme, colour scheme, flowers and candles to coordinating with vendors, managing budgets, and delivering a seamless and memorable experience for all attendees. Whether it’s a corporate conference, wedding, or school festival, we’ll take the stress out of organising and coordinating your event. We have a strong network of the best venues and suppliers and our sister companies cover photobooths, customised gifts and other decor items.

Contact us for a free initial meeting to discuss your ideas and requirements. Together, we’ll formulate the basics and styling of your special day, decide which services you’d like from Party Decor Hire, and share our list of venues and reliable caterers. Let’s collaborate to bring your vision to life and ensure your event is everything you’ve dreamed of and more.

On your special day, you deserve to savour every moment without worrying about the details. Let us take care of coordinating all the small aspects, allowing you to fully enjoy the culmination of months of planning.
